reviewText: I am a huge fan of Bible Black and I have seen all of the episodes (on the internet). Was so good that I decided to buy the DVD's. Awesome graphics and great quality hardcore. The storyline can get confusing from time to time.

reviewText: It is simplu the greatest series of all the anime combined. The graphics are the best, and even the trama works too.

reviewText: Imerri returns as an adult and an investigator for a privet security company. Yet once again she's drawn in to the world of dark magic, as Recca Kitommi is reawakened with in her. Still great sex senses and some religious high lights. In all it's a great new chapter in the series.

reviewText: I love the artwork, I love the storyline and I just can't get enough of this anime.  If you love twisted rituals, hot girls and (of course) sex then this anime is perfect for you.
